concept.title: Upgrading and rolling back the software level of
concept.shortdesc: System administrators can upgrade the software level of the by applying interim fixes. The software level can also be rolled back by removing interim fixes.

conbody.p: You can upgrade or roll back the software level of your that is running in a Docker container or as an RPM on the host OS by applying and removing interim fixes.

Install the update level that you require when you first install . The format of the images that are provided as updates for are identical to the GA-level installation image; there is no need to install the GA-level image before you apply updates.
You can find the list of interim fixes at IBM Support
